MRN_SYN_5_style_2: PROCEDURE: EBUS-TBNA nodal sampling of stations 4R and 7 was performed for staging (CPT 31652). This was followed by Ion robotic bronchoscopy to the right middle lobe. Radial EBUS verified the target. Diagnostic tissue was obtained using both standard forceps and a cryobiopsy probe (CPT 31628, 31627, 31654).
